features.name: Paragon Power
features.description:
At the end of another creature's turn, you may regain one reaction and choose one of the following:
A. Act: Take an action. You may also spend some or all of your remaining movement as part of that action.
B. Resist: Reroll a saving throw against an ongoing effect. Spend 6 hit points to gain advantage on the roll.

features.name: Acid mucus
features.description: Any creature grabbed or restrained by you takes 3 acid damage at the start of their turn.

features.name: Maul
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

features.name: Tendril Grab
features.description: Save: DC 13 vs STR, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: The target is grabbed and pulled 10 feet towards you (escape DC 13).

features.name: Piked Tendril
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage and the target is .

features.name: Trample
features.description: Save: DC 15 vs DEX, a 30 ft. line that is 10 ft. wide extending from yourself, all creatures. Effect: You move to the end of the area without provoking attacks of opportunities. Hit: 11 (3d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Spawn Wormlings
features.description: Utility: reach 10 ft. You spend 1 SP to disgorge 4 Gargling Wormlings. These creatures act after your turn and obey your commands for up to 1 hour, at which point they wither and die.

features.name: Devour
features.description: Requires: You must be bloodied. Overkill: reach 15ft. one grappled or restrained target by you. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage. If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points, it is devoured.
